# Class MemorySnapshot

Class representing a snapshot of an agent's memory state. Contains all memory components (rolling summary, flash memory, long-term memory) at a specific point in time.

##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

destroy

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new MemorySnapshot(params?: [MemorySnapshotInterface](/interfaces/primitives_memory_memory_snapshot.MemorySnapshotInterface)): [MemorySnapshot]()

Creates a new MemorySnapshot instance.

#### Parameters

    * `Optional`params: [MemorySnapshotInterface](/interfaces/primitives_memory_memory_snapshot.MemorySnapshotInterface)

Optional initialization parameters

#### Returns [MemorySnapshot]()




## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this memory snapshot.

#### Returns void
